pros: Tested for durability and used worldwide by expert riders
Made by a trusted name in wheel manufacturing

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the rear wheel to replace the stock which was bent. Was happy with it. The front wheel didn't look right in comparison so I bought this to match the rear. The wheel is alloy, which makes it lighter than the original stock. Being alloy, it improved the braking which is a definite plus on the old schwinn 10 speed. The wheels I received were straight and didn't need any adjustment. I didn't repack the bearings, which some had recommended. After a short ride to disperse the grease, they spin freely. Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: greg fullmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Chrome Wheel Replacement
customer_reviews.text: SS Spokes would have been better, but for the price, these wheels are good. I installed them on an vintage road bike to replace my steel wheels. These perform great. They were lightweight, provide a better braking surface than chromed steel, are already trued (at least in my case), and had the skewers for the quick release.
customer_reviews.author: OverAmbitious

customer_reviews.title: Need to adjust cone nuts.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is OK, maybe good for the price. Be aware that it comes without rim tape, and that the cone nuts are tightened so much that the wheel barely turns. You need to be comfortable with adjusting the cone nuts if you want a free-spinning wheel. Once you add rim tape and adjust the cone nuts it seems to be a good wheel (for Schraeder tube valves.)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product and solid performer
customer_reviews.text: Sta-Tru's front wheel is an excellent replacement for beat-up or damaged wheels. The wheel can take a beating. This is my third wheel purchase by the company as I'm rebuilding yet another steel-framed bike for commuter use. It's a little wider than the wheels it's replacing, but it's more stable and less apt to be damaged on the cracked and buckled pavement that is common in many urban environments. I wouldn't suggest too much curb jumping, but that's up to the individual rider. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike NemethTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: GREY, NOT SILVER.
customer_reviews.text: The image looked consistent in texture/color between the polished silver/chrome spokes/hub and the matte rim. The matte rim just looks cheap on my '71 Schwinn. I'll keep them only because most of the SAG vehicles don't carry 27" anymore. I ride the Schwinn because it's funny to watch riders faces as I pass on a bike 3 times heavier than theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Neff

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is great just remember 27 inch and 700 x23 is are
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is great just remember 27 inch and 700 x23 is are different
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerREIDTHECAT

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel; went right on to my '84 Fuji. Runs perfectly true. A great wheel at a great price. I would have liked stainless spokes, but at this price, I think that's asking a little much.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Odoms

customer_reviews.title: solid rim
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as advertized. Slapped my tire and tube on it, threw it on my bike and it was ready to go. Be sure to order rim liner as it does not come with the rim.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good value wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good value, but ironically, the Sta-Tru wheel was not true when I received it. I had to spend a little time with a spoke wrench to get it trued up. But it looks good and performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Action Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and it is as expected. good quality. I easily replaced my damaged front wheel on my bicycle with this Sta-Tru alloy hub and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the price. I am just a pleasure rider not competative so alloy rims work super for me. shipping container was good quality. Am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my front wheel on my old Schwinn Road Bike. Had an accident and bent the front rim. This was a simple exact replacement. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: A solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: This wheel has proven to be made of true quality. I've logged about 100 miles on it and its had no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It was a REAR WHEEL even though it said front
customer_reviews.text: It could be a great rear wheel, cause that's what I got. The lable on it even said front wheel so it's not really their fault too much. otherwise I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: cheapest of the double wall rims, works ok. quick release hard to use would prefer a nut.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, no damage even though both ends of axle had punched through the shipping box. The Sta-Tru 27" wheel appears to be perfectly true and looks great on my old Schwinn road bike. Very happy with purchase and prompt shipping. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Old Techguy

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you get rim tape
customer_reviews.text: Take note: Sliver does not mean chrome. It's sort of a matte silver/ brushed aluminum look. Looks great nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Daw

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement rim with quick release.
customer_reviews.text: Well made spoked rim. No issues with putting the tire, tube, etc. on it and the quick release worked just fine. Looked like it should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not completely straight, my bike guy had to adjust a little
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I received the rim and it was bent. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the rim and it was bent. I even took it to a bike store to see if they could true the wheel, but it was too far out to be fixed. There was no apparent damage to the package when I received it, so I'm not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on a old Raleigh build
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a old Raleigh build. Great price and lighter then old steel wheels. Best bet on hard to find 27" wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap 27" wheel. Came true and rolls well enough. It's good enough for my old Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: shanks

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what you expect for the price. Nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you expect for the price. Nothing special, but it's a decent wheel that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Assembled in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Assembled in the USA. Would be 5/5 if the spoke nut did not break on one of the spokes.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Kusterer

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement wheel. It's built very well and finished nicely enough. I've hopped curbs, hit potholes, and otherwise ridden off pavement without any problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a perfectly true wheel but good for an inexpensive wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

product_meta.title: Sta Tru Silver Alloy Hub Front Wheel (27X1 ¼-Inch)
product_meta.description: Replacement wheel assembled in the United States of America.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
Silver hub / silver spokes / silver rim
